title: Reduce GST on entry-level two-wheelers: FADA to Centre
description: The Federation of Automobile Dealers Associations (Fada) has called on the government to reduce the goods and services tax (GST) rate on entry-level two-wheelers from 28% to 18%. Fada president Manish Raj Singhania stated that although the two-wheeler segment has seen growth, it is still 20% below pre-pandemic levels. Singhania believes that reducing the GST rate would not only be a policy adjustment but also a socio-economic catalyst, as this segment constitutes 75% of total auto sales volume.
